query: Who won the 2023 F1 World Championship and which team did they drive for?
expected_answer: Max Verstappen won the 2023 F1 World Championship driving for Red Bull Racing.

query: Explain the relationship between 'Context Window' and 'RAG' in modern LLM architecture.
expected_answer: RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) is a technique to overcome the limitations of a Context Window. Instead of fitting all data into the prompt (Context), RAG retrieves only the relevant chunks dynamically.

query: What is the release date of the sequel to the movie 'Dune' (2021), and who directed it?
expected_answer: Dune: Part Two was released on March 1, 2024 (in the US), directed by Denis Villeneuve.

query: What Python library is standard for asynchronous HTTP requests?
Who was the President of the United States in 1600?
expected_answer: There was no President of the United States in 1600 (the US did not exist).
